Led the design and development of the IPU Open Data platform for housing, managing, visualizing and sharing IPU data on parliaments.

IPU Open Data prototype (platform currently under development) / Drupal 7, data visualization, multilingual, responsive, REST APIs

  • Company / Organization: Inter-Parliamentary Union
